name: Beelieve
description:
Description:

This is a puzzle game where you get to play as an unlucky bee who tore its wings before getting trapped in a spiderweb. Your goal is to traverse the web and rescue a group of small flies, without being consumed by a bunch of spooky spiders. Together, you might find a way to escape for good…

Gameplay:
When on the web, click and hold on an adjacent node to walk towards it. Be careful though, walking on the web might cause you to alert the spiders!

Credits:
Design: Diego Teran and Natasha Kononenko
Programming & Sound: Diego Teran
Art: Natasha Kononenko
